Detailed Description

Base class for a legacy joint binding.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum DzLegacyJointParam::ParamAxis

The Axes that a joint parameter can operate on

Enumerator:
X 

The X axis

Y 

The Y axis

Z 

The Z axis

XY 

The X and Y axes (curve parameters only)

XZ 

The X and Z axes (curve parameters only)

YZ 

The Y and Z axes (curve parameters only)

enum DzLegacyJointParam::ParamType

The types of Joint Parameters

Enumerator:
Rotation 

A parameter that controls blending for joint rotations

Scale 

A parameter that controls blending for scaling between nodes

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DzLegacyJointParam::DzLegacyJointParam (  ) 

Default Constructor.

DzLegacyJointParam::DzLegacyJointParam ( DzBone *  driver,
ParamAxis  axis 
)

This is an overloaded member function, provided for convenience. It differs from the above function only in what argument(s) it accepts. Creates a new joint parameter.

Parameters:
driver The node that this joint is bound to.
axis The axis that this joint bends or twists on ( 0 = x, 1 = y, 2 = z )
DzLegacyJointParam::~DzLegacyJointParam (  )  [virtual]

Destructor.

DzLegacyJointParam::DzLegacyJointParam ( const DzInFile *  file  )  [protected]

For internal use only.

This constructor is called by the Framework when loading from a file so that certain initializations can be skipped that will happen later in the file load process.

Parameters:
file The file from which this object was loaded.

Member Function Documentation

void DzLegacyJointParam::addWeightMap ( DzWeightMap *  map  )  [slot]
Parameters:
map The weight map to add to this joint parameter.
void DzLegacyJointParam::beginEdit (  )  [virtual, slot]

Begins an editing operation on the joint parameter. All changes made between the beginEdit() call and the finishEdit() or cancelEdit() call will be added to a single undo operation.

See also:
finishEdit(), cancelEdit()

Reimplemented from DzElement.

Reimplemented in DzLegacyBendParam, DzLegacySmoothScale, and DzLegacyTwistParam.

DzLegacyJointParam::bindingChanged (  )  [signal]

Emitted when the binding needs to be re-evaluated.

void DzLegacyJointParam::cancelEdit (  )  [virtual, slot]

Cancels an editing operation started with a beginEdit() call and rolls back any changes.

See also:
beginEdit(), finishEdit()

Reimplemented from DzElement.

Reimplemented in DzLegacyBendParam, DzLegacySmoothScale, and DzLegacyTwistParam.

void DzLegacyJointParam::driverRemoved (  )  [protected, slot]

Delete this joint param because the driver node has been removed.

void DzLegacyJointParam::finishEdit (  )  [virtual, slot]

Ends an editing operation started with a beginEdit() call and adds the undo item to the undo stack.

See also:
beginEdit(), cancelEdit()

Reimplemented from DzElement.

Reimplemented in DzLegacyBendParam, DzLegacySmoothScale, and DzLegacyTwistParam.

void DzLegacyJointParam::getMatrices ( DzMatrix4 &  dynamicMat,
DzMatrix4 &  staticMat 
) const

Sets the given matrices to the matrices for this joint parameter.

Parameters:
dynamicMat This will be set to the value of the dynamic matrix for the parameter
staticMat This will be set to the value of the static matrix for the parameter
See also:
getDynamicMatrix(), getStaticMatrix(), setMatrices()
float DzLegacyJointParam::getMatSphereWeight ( const DzVec3 &  pos  )  const [protected]

Subclasses can call this function to calculate the weight contribution of the sphere matrices for the given point.

Parameters:
pos The position of the vertex to calculate a weight for
Returns:
The weight for the vertex calculated using only the matrix spheres.
int DzLegacyJointParam::getNumWeightMaps (  )  [slot]
Returns:
The number of vertex weight maps that exist on this joint parameter.

bool  includeSpheres = false 
) [virtual, slot]

Get the rigging properties for this joint parameter.

Parameters:
list The list to populate with pointers to the rigging properties for this joint parameter.
includeSpheres Whether or not to include the properties for the associated spheres

void DzLegacyJointParam::setApplyMatrices ( bool  onOff  ) 

Sets whether the matrices are applied to binding calculations

Parameters:
onOff If true, the matrices are applied, if false, the matrices are ignored.

void DzLegacyJointParam::setStorablePaths ( const QString &  path  )  [virtual]

Classes that contain items derived from DzStorable should override this method to give them a chance to set their storage path. The path passed is relative (no leading drive letter or root path).

Parameters:
path The base path for storables.

Reimplemented from DzBase.

Property Documentation

bool DzLegacyJointParam::applyMatrices [read, write]
Returns:
true if the matrices are used to calculate binding, false if they are ignored.
See also:
setApplyMatrices()
ParamType DzLegacyJointParam::type [read]
Returns:
The type of parameter this is.
